        void assignPlayer(@NotNull
                  org.bukkit.entity.Player player,

        Assign player to team.

        Player is automatically removed from the previous team if necessary.

        See Also:
        player, team

      • assignPlayers

        void assignPlayers(int number,
                   @NotNull
                   org.bukkit.scoreboard.Team team)

        A fixed number of players are drawn, excluding those who have a team. The selected players will be assigned to the team.

        Parameters:
        number - The number of players to select.
        team - The team where selected players should be assigned to.
        See Also:
        number, team

      • assignPlayers

        void assignPlayers(float ratio,
                   @NotNull
                   org.bukkit.scoreboard.Team team)

        A set of players are drawn by ratio, excluding those who have a team. The selected players will be assigned to the team.

        Parameters:
        ratio - The proportion among the players who don't have a team yet. (0.0 to 1.0)
        team - The team where selected players should be assigned to.
        See Also:
        ratio, team

        void setSpawn(@NotNull
              org.bukkit.scoreboard.Team team,
              @NotNull
              java.lang.String spawnTag)
